text: Sip, nosh & learn about eating, drinking & writing about food & wine w/decorated writers, who live la bonne vie, enjoying & covering food & wine at the very highest level! @Salmagundi . Featuring: @MelissaClark @alicefeiring . Moderator: @jessicaseagull Tix: https://tinyurl.com/huv28u43
TODAY: @nytcooking food writer @MelissaClark . She's got a new cookbook of one-pan meals.

Join @MelissaClark , Mason Hereford, & the team from @SouthernFood for a cocktail party & cooking demonstration to celebrate the release of Melissa’s new book, “Dinner in One: Exceptional & Easy One Pan Meals” from 6 to 8:30 p.m. on Thursday, September 22. https://southernfood.org/events/2022/9/22/a-celebration-of-dinner-in-one…

. @MelissaClark author of Dinner in French, brings her home cook's expertise and no-fuss approach to the world of one-pot/pan cooking to the @MJCCA Book Festival. Purchase tickets at https://bit.ly/3RqgFuX.

We're celebrating mothers & mother-figures on the new episode. @ChefKwame & his mother get into his early days, @MelissaClark takes on #MothersDay, @cookingwgranny & her mother introduce us to miyeokguk, a Korean soup served after childbirth. Listen: http://ow.ly/7Zih50EHt1A
Biscuits revealed!
. @MelissaClark is the @SplendidTable house next week to take on your #mothersday cooking questions! Send a voice memo with your questions to contact@splendidtable.org and we will get them answered.

Have you tried the famous #BakedFetaPasta yet? The recipe, first made popular by #Finnish food blogger @jennihayrinen, went viral on TikTok this year. If you want to give it a try this weekend, @MelissaClark shows how to make it on this @GMA video!
Loved reading this essay on what really good food memoirs should strive for, and the path beyond cliché On Appetite by @aliciakennedy

The tomato and feta cheese TikTok trend may be in the rearview, but this one-pan pasta inspired by the viral sensation is a delicious adaptation. New York Times Food columnist @MelissaClark joins @GMA to share her streamlined version. #UltimatePastaWeek
Listeners, are you making a holiday dinner for Passover… or Easter, next Sunday? Do you have a brisket emergency…? Or need some cooking guidance from Melissa Clark? Call us now at 646-435-7280!

This potato leek gratin is PERFECT to make for a blow out Thanksgiving. It might just be the best thing on your table. And you can make it the day before and reheat it before serving while the turkey rests.

My mom's recipe for rice pudding makes THE best rice pudding (actually anyone's mom's recipe for rice pudding is the best rice pudding, that's just how it goes). I adapted it for the electric pressure cooker. Listen to my latest podcast to find out how to make it.
